iface-link_link.description: specifies a parent device name or index

iface-link_master.description: specifies a master device name or index

iface-link_tun-remote4.description: remote IPv4 address of the tunnel

iface-link_tun-local4.description: local IPv4 address of the tunnel

iface-link_tun-remote6.description: remote IPv4 address of the tunnel

iface-link_tun-local6.description: local IPv4 address of the tunnel

iface-link_tun-dev.description: interface to use for tunnel endpoint communication

ignore.description: ignore patterns to skip interface, ip address or routing objects

ipaddr.description: list of ip address prefixes to be ignored

ifname.description: interface names matching this list of regex will be ignored

interfaces.description: list of interface settings (link settings and ip addresses)

vlan_id.description: specifies the VLAN identifier to use

xfrm_link.description: underlying interface used to send and receive the transformed traffic

xfrm_if_id.description: lookup key to match xfrm policies

ethtool.description: network driver and hardware settings via [ethtool(8)](https://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man8/ethtool.8.html)

rx.description: number of ring entries for the Rx ring

rx-mmini.description: number of ring entries for the Rx Mini ring

rx-jumbo.description: number of ring entries for the Rx Jumbo ring

tx.description: number of ring entries for the Tx ring

ntuple.description: enable Rx ntuple filters and actions

advertise.description: speed and duplex advertised by autonegotation

rx.description: number of channels with only receive queues

tx.description: number of channels with only transmit queues

other.description: number of channels used only for other purposes

eee.description: Energy-Efficient Ethernet (according to the IEEE 802.3az specifications)

advertise.description: sets the speed for which EEE should be enabled (see also `change.advertise`)

tx-timer.description: amount of idle time prior asserting Tx LPI (in microseconds)

items.description: period after which the link is reported as down

from.description: select the source prefix to match

to.description: select the destination prefix to match

iif.description: select the incoming device to match

oif.description: select the outgoing device to match

ipproto.description: select the ip protocol to match
